snippet: FRIED--Judith, passed peacefully at her residence on May 15, 2016, Loving wife of Wilbur. Devoted mother of Elizabeth and David. Adorned grandmother of Matthew, William, Emily, Sam, Sophie, Jack and Leo. Interment to take place at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY. Services private. Any additional information, contact "The Riverside Memorial Chapel" 212-362-6600. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIED--Judith, passed peacefully at her residence on May 15, 2016, Loving wife of Wilbur. Devoted mother of Elizabeth and David.
